trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Chelsea
There was one other sighting in Chelsea on or around August 31st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw the sighting again but it did not come down it stayed up high. I used my field glasses to watch it. It was a bright white light till I put my field glass on then it was a multicolored light. It was ruoghly 2 degrees father east that the previous night. while I watched it in my glasses. I saw flashes of light like lightning. At 2am I went in the house because it was boring. The next night it was 1 to 2 degree farther east it was 12:15 Monday morning when I saw it again another 1 degree I let my dogs out about 1am. I saw another object different from the first not quite due east from the horizon. It was doing the same thing as the one as I was watching, flying crazy in the sky. also was multicolored. the first object flew off around 2am the other object was still there when I came in at 3:30 these were 2 support crafts. they were high in the sky. I would guess they were over Canada. They were not swap gas, they were not stars they were not airplanes they were not satellites, they weren't weather balloons. I have no idea of what they are. The light that I saw was like a camera flash.
